column5: Does anyone know of a public launch on the north end of Lake Scugog?  Does Pleasant Point Park have a launch? Thanks for any help!

Yeah there is a launch at Pleasant Point. I haven't used it in a few years but it wasn't too bad when I launched there last time. There is also a launch on the north end of Scugog Island however the road into it is a bit rough.
cesarea, if you want to fish the north end and the scugog river
Launch at view lake !!! It's a few mins up the road from ceaserea more parking and all sandy spot to launch it's quick easy and access to good spots and a 5 min boat ride to get in the river !!!!
That general area good for skis or bass?  Never been to scugog, got called in this morning so i may give it a shot at noon, closest lake to me.
